SEARCH
Package org.myshelfie.view.GUI

Class GameControllerFX

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.view.GUI.GameControllerFX
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameControllerFX extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the GameFXML scene, i.e. the main game scene. This class is responsible for handling all the events that happen in the game, updating the GUI accordingly to the events received by the server, and collecting the input from the user and notify the EventManager to update the Server.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller. This is called automatically by JavaFX.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • setMyNickname

      public void setMyNickname(String nickname)
      Set the nickname of the player that is using this GUI.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player

    • setClient

      public void setClient(Client client)
      Link this controller to the client that is using it.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that is using this controller

    • update

      public void update(GameEvent ev, GameView game)
      Forwards the update of the GUI by scheduling it using a Platform.runLater() call is called directly by ViewGUI.update(GameView, GameEvent).
      Parameters:
      ev - The event that triggered the update
      game - The game view object containing the updated game state

    • updateButForReal

      private void updateButForReal(GameEvent ev, GameView game)
      This is the actual update method. Based on the type of GameEvent this method chooses which items of the view will be updated and calls the corresponding methods.
      Parameters:
      ev - The GameEvent that triggered the update
      game - The GameView object containing the updated game state

    • updateEverything

      private void updateEverything(GameView game)
      Updates all the possible items of the view, regardless of the type of event that triggered the update.
      Parameters:
      game - The GameView object containing the updated game state.

    • onTileClicked

      private void onTileClicked(javafx.scene.image.ImageView tileImage, int row, int col)
      Method that is called when a tile is clicked. It's bound to the on click event of the tileImage object created when the board is updated.
      Parameters:
      tileImage - the ImageView object representing the tile
      row - the row of the tile in the board
      col - the column of the tile in the board

    • isTilesGroupSelectable

      private boolean isTilesGroupSelectable(ImmutableBoard board, List<LocatedTile> unconfirmedSelectedTiles)
      Method that is called every time the user tries to select a Tile. It is used to check wheter the current list of tiles is valid or not.
      Parameters:
      board - The board of the game
      unconfirmedSelectedTiles - The temporary list of tiles that the user is trying to select
      Returns:
      True if the list is valid, false otherwise

    • onArrowClicked

      private void onArrowClicked(int column, javafx.scene.image.ImageView arrowImage)
      Method that is called when a bookshelf column is selected. It's bound to the on click event of the arrowImage object. Calls the notify method to send this information to the server.
      Parameters:
      column - The index of the bookshelf's column that has been selected
      arrowImage - The ImageView object representing the arrow that has been clicked

    • onConfirmTilesSelection

      private void onConfirmTilesSelection()
      Method called when the user clicks on the confirm button. It's bound to the on click event of the confirmButton object. It sends the selected tiles to the server by calling the notify method.

    • onTileFromHandClicked

      private void onTileFromHandClicked(javafx.scene.image.ImageView tileImage, int tileIndex)
      Method called when the user clicks on a tile from their hand. It's bound to the on click event of the tileImage object. It sends the selected tile index to the server by calling the notify method.
      Parameters:
      tileImage - The ImageView object representing the tile that has been clicked
      tileIndex - The index of the tile that has been clicked

    • showErrorDialog

      public void showErrorDialog(String message)
      Update method used to show a dialog with an error message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to show

    • showInfoDialog

      public void showInfoDialog(String message)
      Update method used to show a dialog with an info message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to show

    • updateOtherPlayers

      public void updateOtherPlayers(GameView gameView)
      This method makes use of the OtherPlayerItemController class to update the view of the other players items.
      Parameters:
      gameView - The GameView object containing the updated game state

    • updateGameName

      private void updateGameName(String gameName)

    • udpateColSelectionArrows

      private void udpateColSelectionArrows()
      This method updates the view of the arrows used to select the column. They're shown only if the current state is ModelState.WAITING_SELECTION_BOOKSHELF_COLUMN.

    • updateAmICurrPlayer

      private void updateAmICurrPlayer(boolean amICurrPlayer)
      This method updates the view of the nickname for the player using this view. If this player is the current one, a flag and a shadow are added to the nickname.
      Parameters:
      amICurrPlayer - True if the player using this view is the current player

    • updateTilesConfirmButton

      private void updateTilesConfirmButton()
      This method is used to enable and show the confirm button for the tiles' selection, when the game state is ModelState.WAITING_SELECTION_TILE.

    • updateMyBookshelf

      private void updateMyBookshelf(ImmutableBookshelf bookshelf)
      This method updates the view of the bookshelf of the player using this view.
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - The ImmutableBookshelf object containing the updated bookshelf

    • updateCommonGoalCards

      private void updateCommonGoalCards(GameView gameView)
      This method updates the view of the common goal cards together with their tokens.
      Parameters:
      gameView - The GameView object containing the updated information

    • updateMyCommonGoalToken

      private void updateMyCommonGoalToken(List<ScoringToken> myCommonGoalTokens)
      This method updates the view of the common goal tokens obtained by the player using this view.
      Parameters:
      myCommonGoalTokens - The list of ScoringToken objects representing the obatined tokens

    • updateMyFinalToken

      private void updateMyFinalToken(boolean hasFinalToken)
      Method used to show the final token of the player using this view if he/she has it.
      Parameters:
      hasFinalToken - True if the player has the final token, false otherwise

    • updateMyTilesPicked

      private void updateMyTilesPicked(List<Tile> tileHand)
      Updates the view of the tiles in the hand of the player using this view.
      Parameters:
      tileHand - The list of Tile objects representing the tiles in the hand

    • clearTilesPicked

      private void clearTilesPicked()
      Clears the list of tiles in the hand of the player using this view.

    • updateHelper

      private void updateHelper()
      Updates the view of the helper panel showing the current state of the game.

    • updateMyPersGoal

      private void updateMyPersGoal(PersonalGoalCard card)
      Updates the view of the personal goals of the player using this view.
      Parameters:
      card - The personal goal card that will be shown

    • updateBoard

      private void updateBoard(ImmutableBoard board)
      This method updates the view of the board, by adding or removing tiles from the board's gridPane.
      Parameters:
      board - the board object that will be shown

    • addTileToBoard

      private void addTileToBoard(Tile tile, int row, int col)
      This method allows you to add a tile in the form of an ImageView to the board's gridPane.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile that will be added
      row - The row in which the tile will be added
      col - The column in which the tile will be added

    • clearBoard

      private void clearBoard()
      This method allows you to remove a tile from the board's representation (GridPane).

    • setOnHoverZoom

      private void setOnHoverZoom(javafx.scene.Node item, double defaultScale, double zoomedScale)
      Utility method used to create an onHover effect for a generic Node.
      Parameters:
      item - The node on which the effect will be applied
      defaultScale - The default scale of the node
      zoomedScale - The scale of the node when the mouse is over it

    • setEasterEgg

      public void setEasterEgg(String str)

    • applyEasterEgg

      private void applyEasterEgg()
